description: The image depicts a line of cattle waiting to enter a building labeled as a meatpacking plant. One cow in the foreground expresses frustration about the length of the line, stating they will not return. The central irony lies in the animal's relatable human-like complaint about waiting, starkly contrasting with the fatal purpose of the facility they are queuing to enter. This juxtaposition of mundane inconvenience and existential threat creates a darkly humorous and absurd scenario. The specific environment is identified as Johnson's Meatpacking, a destination presented as merely an inconvenient wait rather than a place of slaughter.
caption: “Just look at this line! ... They'll never get me to come back here again!”
